Activity: Get to the office, grab a coffee, and check emails.
Continue setting up the accounting system. Focus on configuring reports to track fund performance metrics such as return on investment, Sharpe ratio, and tracking error.

Meet with @qres-1, @qres-2, and @qres-3 (Quantitative Researchers) to understand the data flow from their models to the trading platform and how it should be reflected in the accounting system. Topic: Data integration from Quant Research to Accounting.
